data.name: Contraption Maker
data.detailed_description:
Play over 200 official puzzles and over 1,000 user created puzzles in the Workshop.


Build your own ingenious contraptions and puzzles and share them.


Use the many characters that interact in amusing ways.


Create your own Cheese Factory or anything else that you can imagine.


Make your own games with the built-in Javascript Editor using Contraption Maker's physics and parts.


Play online to build contraptions together with up to 8 players in the Maker Lab.

** Contraption Maker is a 2-pack. Buy it and get a copy for a friend to build together! **

data.short_description: Contraption Maker is an open-ended sandbox puzzle game from the creators of The Incredible Machine. Build and solve elaborate contraptions with hamster motors, trampolines, alligators, wrecking balls, zombies, gears, lasers, ghosts, and over 100 more parts
data.reviews:
“Contraption Maker is from the makers of that genre-defining classic, and it's already a recognisable heir to the throne...It's already worth your time and money.”

“It is a from-the-ground-up modernization, with enough familiar elements to instantly excite old fans of The Incredible Machine and enough modern touches to fuel the imaginations of gamers who have never touched the original.”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.7Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM, Pixel Shader 2.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
